translation.zh: 你不能待在这里 太危险了

translation.en: Please, madam, you have to go and sit.
translation.zh: 拜托 女士 请回到座位上坐好

translation.en: [barista in English] Hi. Can I help you?
translation.zh: 你好 请问需要点什么？
一杯卡布奇诺 一杯渣酿白兰地

translation.en: I've heard the volcano has been very active recently.
translation.zh: 我听说火山最近活动很频繁

translation.en: And what brings you to Stromboli?
translation.zh: 你为什么会来斯通波利呢？

translation.en: You can't just disappear like that.
From Caro e Sara. You know?
translation.zh: 我以前跟卡罗来过的 知道吧？

translation.en: Ah, Pietro, you painted the house!
translation.zh: 皮埃罗 你把房子粉刷过啦！

translation.en: [man in Dutch] What am I doing wrong, Sara?
translation.zh: 我做错了什么 莎拉？

translation.en: -[in English] Okay, thank you very much. -E che l'acqua…
translation.zh: 好的 谢谢你 好
（苏菲 - 星期四一切全被你搞砸了）

translation.en: Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck. Fuck.
Oh! Would you like to sit down?
Uh, just to rinse it off?
-Yeah, I know what you mean, but it's not. -Huh?
translation.zh: 我明白你的意思 但你搞错了

translation.en: -I have a very strong liver. -Oh, you do?
Uh. I really have to get back.
Oh. Uh, I don't know. I've never seen it.
translation.zh: 不知道 我还没亲眼见过呢

translation.en: I bought it on eBay, uh, two years ago?
translation.zh: 那地方是我在易贝网上买的大概两年前吧

translation.en: Is it in the village, your apartment?

translation.zh: 不 在西班牙的某个地方

translation.en: Oh, no. The group will be worried.
translation.zh: 我再不回去 大家会担心的

translation.en: What about one more drink? Come on. Do as the Romans do.
translation.zh: 再喝一杯怎么样？来嘛 入乡随俗

translation.en: That's why you need an aperitivo.
translation.zh: 所以才要来点餐前酒呀
不行 延斯会生气的

translation.en: Well, what about you? Is no one waiting for you?
translation.zh: 那你呢？没有人等你回家吗？

translation.en: You have to rub it on your face, for sunburn.
translation.zh: 请把它涂抹在脸上 有助于缓解晒伤

translation.en: -[in Dutch] Ugh. Yuck. -[in English] No, no.
-My daughter was conceived on this island. -[man] Oh.
translation.zh: 我就是在这座岛上怀上我女儿的

translation.en: I'm more of a cat person myself.
So, what's the name of your cat?
What will happen to Susie if the volcano erupts?
translation.zh: 要是现在火山爆发了 苏西会怎样？

translation.en: What will happen to your daughter?
I think she will be very relieved.
translation.zh: 我想她应该会感到解脱吧
喜欢 太美了 糟糕！

translation.en: Uh, it's, um, it's just here.
And thank you for a lovely evening.
translation.zh: 谢谢你陪我度过了一个美好的夜晚

translation.en: [in English] Hi, did you found a bag?
translation.zh: 你好 请问你有看到一个包包吗？
你有没有发现一个包包？

translation.en: And in it was a telephone, a towel, a…
translation.zh: 里面有手机、毛巾 还有…

translation.en: Could you please lend me some money?
I lost my bag on the island. I don't know where it is.
translation.zh: 我在岛上把包给丢了 我找不到包包

translation.en: And now, I don't know where to go.
translation.zh: 现在我也不知道该去哪儿

translation.en: Yeah, sorry. I don't think we've met before.
translation.zh: 这样啊 抱歉 我们好像没见过吧

translation.en: We've met on the boat. Do you not… [laughs]
translation.zh: 我们在船上见过 你不…

translation.en: -Chi cacchio sei? -[in Dutch] Calm down, man.
[in English] Keep your hands off me, yeah?
-[Sara in Dutch] Okay. -Tu mi devi pagare, devi pagare!
Calm down. I will pagare, okay? Calm down. Just calma.
translation.zh: 冷静 我会收拾干净的 好吗？别激动 冷静点

translation.en: I'm going to pay. I just need to find my bag, okay?
translation.zh: 我会赔你钱的但得先找到我的包 好吗？

translation.en: [in English] No, I don't have any money, but it's only for tonight, okay?
translation.zh: 我现在没钱但就今天一个晚上 好吗？

translation.en: -[Sara] No, no, no, no, no! -[man] Oh, ma te ne vai o no?
Don't you touch me, I only want to use your toilet, okay?
translation.zh: 你别碰我 我只是想借用一下厕所

translation.en: -Te ne devi andare… -Fuck you, Mr. Romantic Bed and Breakfast.
translation.zh: 去死吧你 去你的浪漫住宿加早餐

translation.en: Oh no, Gustav. Is he okay?
translation.zh: 糟了 古斯塔夫 它还好吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I gave him some bread, too.
translation.zh: 它没事 我也给了它一些面包
你需要帮助吗 莎拉？

translation.en: I don't know where that is.
translation.zh: 我不知道哪里是我的家

translation.en: [Jens] I think we have room left for Sara, don't we?
translation.zh: 我们有空余的房间给莎拉住吧？
（我为发生的一切道歉 真的）

translation.en: I thought you were staying with…
translation.zh: 你不是跟那个谁在一起吗…
它的主人把我赶出来了

translation.en: [woman] But I told them I was allergic to coriander.
translation.zh: 我跟他们说了我对香菜过敏的
黛安、维奥莱特 这是…

translation.en: You see, it gives me heart palpitations, a little bit boring, but it does.
translation.zh: 香菜会让我心悸听起来无趣 但是真的会
啊 这是在喂兔子吗？

translation.en: We always say dogs. But bastards works too.
translation.zh: 荷兰语常用的是“狗屎运”这个词但说幸运也可以

translation.en: [in English] Right. Hans, this is Sara.
translation.zh: 对 汉斯 这是莎拉
是的 我睡了个好觉

translation.en: And thank you so much for my bag.
translation.zh: 还有 谢谢你帮我找回了包包

translation.en: It was brought back by one of the villagers.
I've made you a kelp salad, Diane.
translation.zh: 黛安 我为你准备了海藻沙拉

translation.en: So, any chance of a glass of organic wine maybe?
translation.zh: 请问我能来杯有机葡萄酒吗？

translation.en: We would appreciate if you would refrain from the use of alcohol during your stay.
translation.zh: 我们希望各位在入住期间戒除酒精

translation.en: Jens will address the group in half an hour.
translation.zh: 延斯会在半小时后跟大家讲话

translation.en: Non, je ne veux pas que tu viennes. [snorts]
C'est fini, tous les deux, tu as oublié?
translation.zh: 我们结束了 记得吗？

translation.en: He had some sort of coke-induced psychosis.
translation.zh: 他有一次吸食可卡因后精神错乱

translation.en: Okay, will you keep an eye on me?
translation.zh: 好了 你得看着点我 好吧？

translation.en: Last time I did this I fucked my husband's best friend in the…
translation.zh: 我上次嗑完药睡了我老公最好的朋友 而且是在…

translation.en: We all have our own story.
translation.zh: 每个人都有自己的故事

translation.en: Some of you have had problems in the relationships.
translation.zh: 你们有些人饱受情感关系的困扰

translation.en: Some have had problems with drugs and alcohol.
translation.zh: 有些沉迷于毒品和酒精

translation.en: Now take a moment and thank yourself for coming here
translation.zh: 现在让我们抽出一点时间庆幸自己来到这里

translation.en: and giving yourself the opportunity to heal.
translation.zh: 给了自己一个疗愈的机会

translation.en: [Jens] Sara's from Holland and she'll be joining us for a while.
translation.zh: 莎拉来自荷兰她会和我们一起待一阵子

translation.en: -[in Dutch] Oh, great. You're Dutch too? -[in English] Yes.
translation.zh: -太棒了 你也是荷兰人？-是的

translation.en: [Jens] I hope you all enjoyed our last evening meal
translation.zh: 希望各位喜欢我们的最后一顿晚餐
是珊蒂为大家精心准备的
从明天起 我们将开始禁食

translation.en: [Jens] Guys! The next few days you will go on one of the most important journeys
translation.zh: 各位！接下来的几天你们将踏上人生中

translation.en: You will travel through fear, past shame, and anger.
translation.zh: 你们将历经恐惧、羞耻和愤怒

translation.en: And there will be moments when you just want to give up.
translation.zh: 也许某时某刻 你们会想放弃

translation.en: If you put your work into it,

translation.zh: 明天 我们就要开始努力喽！

translation.en: -This is my fifth time here. -[Sara] Really?
translation.zh: -我已经是第五次来了-真的吗？

translation.en: How wonderful. Goodnight, then. See you tomorrow.
translation.zh: 真好 那么晚安了 明天见

translation.en: [in English] So my son studied for half a year.
translation.zh: 我儿子只上了半年的学

translation.en: That's right, yes. And you want me to pay the full tuition?
translation.zh: 对 没错 可你却要我付全部的学费？

translation.en: Well, do you know what that makes you, you fucking bitch, a thief.
translation.zh: 知道你这种行为叫什么吗？这叫抢劫 死贱人

translation.en: No, no, no, I won't take that back.
translation.zh: 不 我不会收回那句话

translation.en: Do you know how much it costs to study at Cambridge?
translation.zh: 你知道去剑桥上学要花多少钱吗？

translation.en: I had to take two jobs, I just worked like a dog.
translation.zh: 不得不打两份工 做牛做马

translation.en: Uh, how old is your son?
Um, is the air conditioning working in your room because mine…
translation.zh: 你房里的空调还好吗？我房里的…

translation.en: Mine seems to have been broken. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 我的好像坏了 天啊

translation.en: So much nicer than mine, I'm going to complain to this Thandi woman.
translation.zh: 比我的好太多了我要去找那个叫珊蒂的女人理论

translation.en: [Jens] Yes! Can you feel the vibration?
-I'm so sorry. I've got something in… -[Jens] Yeah!
It's gonna be a tough week! Yeah!
That's right. It seems like it. Yes!
translation.zh: 是啊 似乎是这样 没错！
-你们需要这种能量 对吗？-对！

translation.en: You want to create an experience of life!
translation.zh: 来创造全新的生活体验！

translation.en: Just feel the joy of being alive!
translation.zh: 专心感受活着的乐趣吧！

translation.en: Sorry, I think I, uh… I need to throw up.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我好像有点想吐

translation.en: It's okay, Sara. It's all good.
translation.zh: 没关系 莎拉 没事的

translation.en: Remember when you didn't feel any shame or fear?
translation.zh: 还记得曾经你们的世界没有羞耻和恐惧

translation.en: Now, go back to that time.
translation.zh: 现在 回到那个时候
那时候 一切都是那么地纯粹

translation.en: [Sara's Mom in Dutch] Oh, Sara. Sweetheart.
translation.zh: 哦 莎拉 亲爱的

translation.en: You look like a fashion model.
[in Dutch] Hi, it's Sofie. I never check my voicemail, so message me, please.
translation.zh: 你好 我是苏菲 我从不查看语音信箱所以 请给我发短信吧

translation.en: Oh, Harold, you're an angel. Thank you.
translation.zh: 哈罗德 你真是个天使 谢谢
是啊 我当然会哭了

translation.en: I mean, they starve you to death and then-- Ooh, yes.
translation.zh: 他们把人饿个半死 然后…噢 谢谢

translation.en: They touch you with their little alien hands.
translation.zh: 然后用像外星人一样的手碰你

translation.en: Uh, not me, I told them beforehand, no touching.
translation.zh: 没碰我 我事先声明了 不让人碰

translation.en: I think it should be avoided at all costs.
translation.zh: 我认为无论如何都要避免肢体接触

translation.en: [laughs] But what about when you're in a relationship?
translation.zh: 那你跟别人谈恋爱的时候呢？

translation.en: I think a relationship should be avoided at all costs.
translation.zh: 我认为无论如何都不要谈恋爱
我同意 举双手赞成

translation.en: Wait, wait, wait, wait, wait. You've never been in a relationship?
translation.zh: 慢着 你从来没谈过恋爱？

translation.en: Then I'd have to have sex and I don't like sex.
translation.zh: 这样一来我就得跟人做爱可我不喜欢做爱

translation.en: -Oh, my God, you don't like sex? -[scoffs]
translation.zh: 天啊 你不喜欢做爱？
我才不要摸来摸去 鬼吼鬼叫的呢
-我喜欢做爱-是 我们知道 莎拉

translation.en: We saw you on the boat going behind the bar

translation.zh: 跟那个帅气的咖啡师跑到吧台后面去了

translation.en: why is it still not acceptable for women to enjoy sex just like men?
translation.zh: 女人就不能像男人一样享受性爱吗？

translation.en: I didn't see, but from what I've heard of that barista guy,
translation.zh: 我虽然没看见但听说那个咖啡师性感迷人

translation.en: I think even I would have made an exception for him.
translation.zh: 就连我都有可能为他破例呢

translation.en: Oh, sweet little thing. Oh, my darling.
translation.zh: 噢 可爱的小家伙 亲爱的

translation.en: Oh, uh. Come here, come on, my darling.
translation.zh: 过来 来吧 宝贝

translation.en: I guess it doesn't like to be touched, huh?
translation.zh: 它也许是不喜欢被人触碰吧

translation.en: Does anybody know how many planets there are?
translation.zh: 谁知道太阳系有多少颗行星吗？

translation.en: No, no, no, there are eight.
Then there is, of course, Uranus.
translation.zh: 然后 当然了 还有天王星

translation.en: There's Jupiter and Neptune, so it's eight.
translation.zh: 加上木星和海王星 一共八个

translation.en: No, no, no. Pluto was thrown out.
translation.zh: 不 冥王星被踢出行星行列了

translation.en: The International Astronomic Union decided in 2006
translation.zh: 国际天文学联合会在2006年时

translation.en: that Pluto was no longer officially regarded as a planet.
translation.zh: 正式判定冥王星不再被视为行星
可怜的冥王星 太凄惨了

translation.en: -[bell chimes] -One moment you're a family and the next…
translation.zh: 上一秒还是大家庭的成员 下一秒…

translation.en: [in Dutch] Ah, sorry. This isn't going to work.
Hi, I'm having lots of fun at my party and--
translation.zh: 嗨 我在生日派对上玩得很开心…

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Keep your hands off her!

translation.zh: 你为什么要搞砸我的派对？

translation.en: Jens is expecting you for a one-on-one.
translation.zh: 延斯在等你做一对一辅导

translation.en: I'm really sorry, but I'm leaving.
Thank you very much for your hospitality. I really appreciate it, but, um…
translation.zh: 谢谢你们的热情款待我真的很感谢 但是…
-我接受不了这个课程-没关系

translation.en: Jens is waiting for you at the coffee bar down the street.
translation.zh: 延斯在街上的咖啡厅等你

translation.en: Maybe you could have a cappuccino.
translation.zh: 也许你可以去喝杯卡布奇诺
-早上好-早上好 提齐安娜

translation.en: -Pago dopo alla cassa. -[server] D'accordo, va bene.
translation.zh: -我之后再付钱-好的 没问题

translation.en: As long as it rumbles, it won't erupt.
translation.zh: 只要它还在隆隆作响 就不会爆发

translation.en: This is so much better than charcoal water.
translation.zh: 这可真比木炭水好喝多了

translation.en: Oh, I thought coffee is poison.
[inhales] One day at a time, right?
translation.zh: 人得活在当下 对吧？

translation.en: Okay, shouldn't you ask me things then?
translation.zh: 你不是该问我一些问题吗？

translation.en: About, I don't know, my lonely childhood or why I blew up my marriage?
translation.zh: 比方说 询问我孤单的童年或者我为什么会毁了自己的婚姻？

translation.en: Well, I thought we were having a one-on-one.
translation.zh: 不是说要跟我一对一交流吗？

translation.en: Listen, you don't come across as someone who likes to share things.
translation.zh: 听着 你看起来不像是喜欢分享的人
我很高兴你加入了我们
好吧 最后一个问题

translation.en: Why do you hate yourself so much?

translation.zh: 那是因为我们失去了连结
所以我们要重新建立连结

translation.en: I want you to pair up and lie on top of each other.
translation.zh: 请大家两两组队一个人躺在另一个人身上

translation.en: Adela, why don't you pair up with Matteo?
translation.zh: 阿黛拉 你跟马提奥一队吧？

translation.en: And Eva, please team up with Max.
translation.zh: 伊娃 你跟麦克斯一队

translation.en: -Shall we pair? -[Hans] Want to pair up?
Oh, you should stay away from him.
You don't need another asshole in your life.
translation.zh: 别跟这种混蛋扯上关系
天啊 莎拉 少对我指手画脚

translation.en: -[in Dutch] Shall we share a mat together? -Um…
translation.zh: 要不要跟我睡一个垫子？
抱歉 莎拉 我很重吧？

translation.en: [grunts] I'm not sure this is entirely hygienic.
translation.zh: 这么做是不是有点不卫生啊？

translation.en: You're lying on top of another human being
translation.zh: 你正躺在另一个人类的身上

translation.en: who's just as scared and vulnerable as you are.
[in Dutch] Okay, this isn't going to work.
It's driving me crazy, do you understand?
translation.zh: 我都快疯了 你懂吗？
阳痿、情感问题、精神崩溃

translation.en: -What's wrong? -I just can't, I, I, I… Don't touch me.
translation.zh: -有什么问题？-我就是受不了…别碰我

translation.en: Why is it so hard for you to be close to another man?
translation.zh: 你为什么难以忍受跟男人接近？
-住手 见鬼 别碰我-拜托！

translation.en: I've had enough of this cheap bullshit nonsense, okay?
translation.zh: 我受够你这些无聊的活动了

translation.en: -[Jens] Okay, give it to me. -Fuck off, Jens!
translation.zh: -好的 尽情宣泄吧-滚开 延斯！

translation.en: [Jens] Yes, give me the anger, Hans!
translation.zh: 对 发泄你的愤怒 汉斯！

translation.en: -You just leave me be, okay? -Come here.
translation.zh: -你让我一个人静一静 好吗？-来吧

translation.en: Yeah, come on! Give it to me! Yes!
translation.zh: 对 来吧！对我发泄！好的！

translation.en: Give it to me, come on!
translation.zh: 用尽全力出击 来啊！

translation.en: Let it all out! Come on!
Go for it, come on! Yes!
This is the root of your pain.
Did you lead the life you wanted?
translation.zh: 你们过上了自己想要的生活吗？

translation.en: I know this can be painful, but it's important.
translation.zh: 我知道回忆会带来痛苦 但这很重要

translation.en: when they wanted a few models at their party…
translation.zh: 如果想找嫩模 就会打电话给我…

translation.en: Who got paid a lot of money in exchange for partying.
translation.zh: 换漂亮姑娘们去参加派对

translation.en: One of them was really young.
translation.zh: 其中一个女孩子很年轻
她不知道这背后的买卖

translation.en: [Jens] We have a limited amount of time here on Earth.
How do you want to spend it?
Who do you want to spend it with?
Who do you want to be?
[Diane] Does she talk to you, your daughter?
translation.zh: 你的女儿会跟你聊天吗？

translation.en: She's angry with me now, so…
translation.zh: 但现在她正生我的气 所以…
喔 生气没关系 “愤怒是好事”

translation.en: I was so proud of him, my son.
He was so smart and handsome and off to Cambridge.
translation.zh: 他头脑聪明 人也长得帅还考上了剑桥大学

translation.en: I just missed all the signs.
and you've found what you're looking for…
[Harold] Come here, darling. Come on, come on, don't be afraid.
translation.zh: 过来 亲爱的 来吧 别害怕

translation.en: [Harold] I only want to help you.
Yeah, come on, come on. Don't be afraid.
Yeah, okay. Thank you so much.
I'm so sorry, Jens, I had a little trouble turning back to the light.
translation.zh: 真的很抱歉 延斯 我睡过头了

translation.en: You all paid a lot of money for this week and made a long journey to get here.
translation.zh: 你们为这一周的课程花了很多钱还大老远跑过来

translation.en: So tell me, why are you here?
translation.zh: 告诉我 你们为什么来这里？

translation.en: [Hans] A friend of mine signed me up.
translation.zh: 我一个朋友帮我报的名

translation.en: You could be eating lobster on the French Riviera.
translation.zh: 你们明明可以去蔚蓝海岸吃龙虾

translation.en: Why did you divorce your husband?
translation.zh: 你为什么要跟你丈夫离婚？

translation.en: -[laughs] -[Jens] Why did you marry a dick?
translation.zh: 你为什么要嫁给一个混蛋？

translation.en: Why are you in a dysfunctional relationship
translation.zh: 你为什么会跟自己的父母

translation.en: with your parents and your daughter?
-I never said that. -Why do you drink too much?
translation.zh: -我没这么说过-你为什么喝那么多酒？

translation.en: -Sorry, I find this a bit-- -And the most important question of all.
translation.zh: -抱歉 我觉得这有点…-还有一个最重要的问题

translation.en: Why did you let your entire life be determined by the fact
translation.zh: 为什么要让一次被强暴的经历

translation.en: I don't know what you're talking about.
You don't feel there's a connection?
translation.zh: 你没有察觉到其中的关联吗？

translation.en: A connection? A connection to what?
To what's happening to you right now.
[in Dutch] Jesus, what a load of crap.
translation.zh: 天啊 真是胡说八道

translation.en: I don't see the point in dragging up old shit from,
translation.zh: 把那种陈年旧事翻出来有什么意义？

translation.en: I don't know, like 25 years ago!
[Jens] Have you talked to Hans about this?
Maybe you guys can help each other.
If you don't act and do something, your lives will be ruined by this.
translation.zh: 如果不采取行动那些经历会毁掉你们的人生

translation.en: You'll steal your own chance of happiness
translation.zh: 剥夺你们拥有幸福的机会

translation.en: and fuck up the most important relationships in your lives.
translation.zh: 破坏你们最重要的情感关系

translation.en: Including the ones with your children.
translation.zh: 包括你们跟孩子的感情

translation.en: [whispering in Dutch] When was your last confession, my child?
translation.zh: 你上一次告解是什么时候 孩子？
感觉上一次做告解已经是
好几个世纪以前的事了

translation.en: But he didn't really know how to deal with it.
translation.zh: 但他其实也不知道该怎么办

translation.en: "If you just don't think about it for long enough…
translation.zh: 只要你不去想它 时间长了…

translation.en: it will be like it never happened."
translation.zh: 就可以当作事情从来没发生过

translation.en: I don't know how to do it.
[in English] Everyone, this is a role play.
translation.zh: 各位 我们现在进行角色扮演

translation.en: Hans is your ex-husband and Helene is you.
translation.zh: 汉斯是你前夫 而海琳则扮演你
黛安 准备好就可以开始了

translation.en: I tried so hard to reach out to you.
But you just… You just close me down. You push me away.
translation.zh: 但你总是拒绝接受 把我推开

translation.en: No, I don't think you wanted to hear what I had to say, so--
translation.zh: 我觉得我要说的那些话你不会想听的 所以…

translation.en: But you don't know that that was true.
And I would have done anything, I would have done anything to save you.
translation.zh: 我愿意为你做任何事只要能救你 我可以不顾一切

translation.en: You actually never gave me a chance.
You closed me down. You pushed me away.
translation.zh: 你把我拒之门外 把我推开

translation.en: I don't think you wanted to hear what I had to say.
translation.zh: 我觉得我要说的那些话你不会想听的

translation.en: didn't you notice a change in your daughter?
translation.zh: 难道你就没注意到女儿的转变吗？

translation.en: I… I… I don't know why…
-I'm sorry, guys, I just can't do this. -What is it, Harold?
translation.zh: -对不起 我做不来-怎么了 哈罗德？

translation.en: I don't know how this works, I…
translation.zh: 我不知道该怎么演 我…

translation.en: I don't know anything about families.
translation.zh: 我对父子亲情一无所知

translation.en: It was always just me and my mother, and…
translation.zh: 我一直跟妈妈相依为命 但是…
所以 她一直把我当作

translation.en: It's not about doing things right or wrong.
and see where it leads you.
Didn't you feel something had happened to your daughter?
translation.zh: 你难道没有察觉你的女儿出事了？

translation.en: I… I… I think I did notice…
But I… I didn't… I didn't want to acknowledge it.
I couldn't bear that someone had taken
translation.zh: 我女儿所有的快乐被某人一朝夺去

translation.en: all the joy out of my little girl.
translation.zh: 我无法忍受那样的事实

translation.en: Of what happened to your child.
Even if this wasn't his fault.
translation.zh: 即使那根本不是他的错

translation.en: You were just so caught up in your own shame,
translation.zh: 你只顾着为自己感到丢脸

translation.en: you couldn't be there for her.
I need you to talk to Sara.
What do you want to say to her?
[in Dutch] You should have told me, Sara.
translation.zh: 你应该告诉我的 莎拉

translation.en: [Karel] Maybe everything would have been different.
Maybe we'd have had a chance.
Oh God, I don't… Sorry, what's going on? I don't… Who's he?
translation.zh: 天啊 我不…对不起什么情况？我不…他是谁？

translation.en: -Oh, I'm the guy who raped your daughter. -[Helene] No, you were not invited.
translation.zh: -我就是强奸你女儿的人-没有人请你来

translation.en: I don't think I want this, okay?
translation.zh: 我不想再看下去了 好吗？

translation.en: -I don't think I want it. -Want to stop?
No, I don't want him here.
translation.zh: 不 我不要他来这里

translation.en: -I'm not going to do this, Jens, I'm, uh… -Do what?
translation.zh: -我做不到 延斯 我…-做不到什么？

translation.en: [Hans] I'm just not even going to try and have a conversation with a rapist.
translation.zh: 我不会尝试跟一个强奸犯文明地谈话

translation.en: You don't interest me in the slightest. [laughs]
translation.zh: 我对你一点兴趣都没有

translation.en: But I'd like to meet your daughter.
-[in Dutch] No, don't sit with him. -Jesus, Mom.
translation.zh: -不 别跟他坐在一块儿-天啊 妈妈
不 亲爱的 来跟我坐

translation.en: I'm only trying to protect you, okay?
translation.zh: 我只是想保护你 懂吗？

translation.en: [Sara] But sweetheart, I love you. I love you so much.
translation.zh: 可是亲爱的 我爱你 我太爱你了

translation.en: It doesn't seem like it at all.
-Can I talk to Sofie? -[man] Where are you?
translation.zh: -我能跟苏菲谈谈吗？-你在哪里？

translation.en: -I tried calling but she won't pick up. -[man] What do you expect?
translation.zh: -我给她打电话她都不接-你指望她怎样？

translation.en: [Sofie] I don't want to talk to her.
[Helene] I… I… I… I just don't understand. Why can't I be Sara anymore?
translation.zh: 我不明白为什么我不能再演莎拉了？

translation.en: I… I thought it went very, very well today.
translation.zh: 我觉得我今天演得很好呀

translation.en: Absolutely. You've been a great help.
For this reenactment, you play the rapist of Sara.
translation.zh: 这次的情景再现你来演强暴莎拉的人

translation.en: A sweet drink with the smell of banana.
And you've already had too much so you feel a bit dizzy.
translation.zh: 你已经喝多了 头有点晕
但同时 你也很开心

translation.en: You enjoy the music. You love to dance.
translation.zh: 你享受音乐 你喜欢跳舞

translation.en: And all the guys are watching you because you're so…
translation.zh: 你吸引了所有人的目光因为你是那么地…

translation.en: You're so pure and incredibly beautiful.
translation.zh: 你纯洁无暇 明艳动人

translation.en: Sorry, I think we should stop.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我们到此为止吧

translation.en: Because I don't think this is good for Violet.
translation.zh: 我觉得继续下去会让维奥莱特感到不适

translation.en: -You think you can do this, Violet? -Yes.
translation.zh: -你可以继续吗 维奥莱特？-可以

translation.en: If you change your mind, please, just let us know. Okay?
translation.zh: 如果你改主意了就跟我们说一声 好吗？

translation.en: You've had too much so you feel a bit dizzy.
translation.zh: 你喝了太多酒 有点头晕

translation.en: You go after her and ask if she's alright.
translation.zh: 你跟上她 询问她是否还好

translation.en: [Sara in English] And you both sit down.
[in English] Then you push her to the ground.
-[Hans] I-- -You push her to the ground.
And you're whispering, "Maybe someone is coming."
translation.zh: 你小声说：“会有人过来的”

translation.en: [in English] And then you rip off her skirt,
swing it around and throw it away.
translation.zh: 甩了两圈 把它扔了出去

translation.en: [in Dutch] You want this just as bad as I do.
[Hans in English] Hey, don't cry. Don't cry. It was just a joke, okay?
translation.zh: 嘿 别哭 我只是开个玩笑 好吧？

translation.en: It was just a… I'll get it back. I'll get it back.
Hey, it was just a joke.
translation.zh: 嘿 我跟你开玩笑呢

translation.en: [laughing] It's a joke, I'll get it back right away.
translation.zh: 只是开个玩笑 我这就把它捡回来

translation.en: I think you want something else.
[in English] And then he turns you around.
And he pulls off your underwear.
Okay, okay, I… I think we… we should stop. I've… I've seen enough.
translation.zh: 好了 我们停下吧 我看够了

translation.en: [Jens] None of this was your fault.

translation.zh: 不要绝望 我的孩子

translation.en: Questa è la mia proprietà! Eh?
Vattene! Questa è la mia proprietà. Ancora qua sei. -Pietro, please. -Chiamo la polizia.
translation.zh: 皮埃…皮埃罗 请你冷静

translation.en: -I want to say I'm sorry. -Puttana. Tu devi pagare…
translation.zh: 皮埃罗 我想来说声对不起

translation.en: This is for you, for making such a mess. I'm really sorry, okay?
translation.zh: 这些钱你拿着我差点把房子烧了 真的很抱歉
是呀 人生真美好 对吧？

translation.en: You should dance as well. Come on, come on.
translation.zh: 我们也去跳舞吧 来

translation.en: I loved my mother, but she didn't even like me!
translation.zh: 我爱我妈妈 可她甚至都不喜欢我！

translation.en: But I got all her money, so I win!
translation.zh: 但我继承了她所有的钱所以我赢了！

translation.en: -Calma, calma. -Take it easy. Take it easy, take it easy.
-Oh! -No, no, no. You keep him back.
Okay, okay. We'll take you home.
translation.zh: 好了 我们送你回家

translation.en: [Harold] Sara, what are we going to do if the volcano erupts?
translation.zh: 莎拉 要是火山喷发了我们该怎么办？

translation.en: I'd try to get some sleep, Harold, okay?
translation.zh: 我会尽量睡一觉 哈罗德 好吗？

translation.en: Hey, sweetie, it's gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 嘿 亲爱的 没事的
对不起 搞砸了你的派对

translation.en: [Sofie] It was the worst birthday ever.
translation.zh: 那是我这辈子最糟糕的生日

translation.en: -But there's nothing you can do now. -I know.
translation.zh: -但你现在没办法弥补了-我知道

translation.en: Sweetheart, when I'm home I need to tell you about my past.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 等我回到家要告诉你一些往事

translation.en: -[Hans] Ciao! Grazie. -[Sara] Thank you so much!
Don't worry, it's not what you think.
translation.zh: 别担心 这不是你以为的那东西

translation.en: Will you come to Holland and visit me?
